DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety efficacy intravitreal Eylea injection set interval , versus variable dosing schedule ( likely longer one month ) , base specific individual 's disease progression . There approximately 50 men woman least 18 year age , diagnose type 1 type 2 diabetes , take part study 5 location United States .
